headline: L3Harris Beats on Q2 Earnings, Raises '25 Revenue View
summary: L3Harris beats on Q2 earnings and raises 2025 revenue and EPS guidance on broad-based segment growth.

raw.headline: L3Harris Beats on Q2 Earnings, Raises '25 Revenue View
raw.summary: L3Harris beats on Q2 earnings and raises 2025 revenue and EPS guidance on broad-based segment growth.

headline: Textron Q2 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Improve Y/Y
summary: Textron posts a Q2 earnings beat as revenues rise 5.4% Y/Y. The company reiterates its 2025 EPS estimate.

raw.headline: Textron Q2 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Improve Y/Y
raw.summary: Textron posts a Q2 earnings beat as revenues rise 5.4% Y/Y. The company reiterates its 2025 EPS estimate.

headline: L3Harris CEO Notes "Inflection Point" In Defense Investment Cycle
summary: L3Harris raised its outlook with its Thursday beat, Textron beats estimates. General Dynamics clears a buy zone on earnings.

raw.headline: L3Harris CEO Notes "Inflection Point" In Defense Investment Cycle
raw.summary: L3Harris raised its outlook with its Thursday beat, Textron beats estimates. General Dynamics clears a buy zone on earnings.
